definition: to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: The candidate's campaign was attended with too much ballyhoo .
sentences.chinese: 这个候选人的竞选活动致力于太多的大举造势。

sentences.english: The reporter wants to heckle the candidate with those embarrassing question.
sentences.chinese: 记者想用那些让人难为情的问题来刁难这位候选人。

sentences.english: The political rally was souped up by the appearance of the candidates.
sentences.chinese: 这次政治集会由于各候选人的出席而显得更为热闹。

sentences.english: He said she never supported any particular presidential candidate.
sentences.chinese: 他说她从未支持过任一总统候选人。

sentences.english: The candidates are running neck and neck in this election.
sentences.chinese: 这场选举中候选人难分高下。

sentences.english: When it comes to their political backgrounds and personal style, the two presidential candidates are quite different.
sentences.chinese: 就政治背景和个人风格而言，两位候选人截然不同。

sentences.english: Latin America has a couple of candidates, but they are trailing.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁美洲有许多候选人，但是他们正在落后。

sentences.english: As for teeth, the candidate with the straightest, wins the election.
sentences.chinese: 在牙齿方面，牙齿最整齐的候选人赢出大选。

sentences.english: But they're not the ones covering the candidates.
sentences.chinese: 但他们却帮不了候选人的忙。

sentences.english: Televised political promotions are not frequent, and the candidates have little outdoor advertising.
sentences.chinese: 电视经常播放政治宣传，候选人的室外广告很少。

sentences.english: Nor is either candidate proposing serious tax reform.
sentences.chinese: 两位候选人都未提出重大税改政策。

sentences.english: The liberal candidate was accused by his conservation opponent of being a bleeding heart on welfare issues.
sentences.chinese: 自由派候选人在福利问题上被保守派对手斥为老好人。

sentences.english: The Democratic Presidential hopeful plans to visit the fallen officier's family.
sentences.chinese: 这位民主党候选人希望能够慰问死者的家属。

sentences.english: Being more attractive could help a candidate garner more votes.
sentences.chinese: 更具有魅力可能有助于候选人获得更多的选票。

sentences.english: The short-listed candidates will run off for presidency on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 入围的总统候选人将在周一进行最后的决选。

sentences.english: The other students in each group supported the candidates.
sentences.chinese: 组里其他的学生就支持候选人。

definition: to be a candidate in an election or other selection process/to run for office/to turn out to vote
to take part in an election/to run for office
to fail to be chosen (or elected)/to lose an election
to continue in (a political) office/to serve for another term of office
